## [Demo](https://youtu.be/gEIxp6inROw) 

><p align="center" > **AI accessibility tool converts Natural Language to tangible action.** </p>




## Functionality
BotX.ai enables users to navigate the web, execute complex tasks, and interact with webpages using natural language. It employs a sophisticated pipeline centered around HTML, converting raw HTML into a format that AI can effectively utilize to perceive and manipulate web content.

## Development Approach
For the Frontend, BotX.ai is crafted using React, Typescript, and Next.js. We integrated OpenAI's Whisper with Transformers.js to create a seamless Speech to Text and Text to Speech interface.

On the Backend, we utilized Node.js, and Google AI
